presentation.fsa
Class GraphElement

java.lang.Object
  presentation.fsa.GraphElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
PresentationElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
Edge, EdgeHandler, FSAGraph, GraphLabel, Node, SelectionGroup
public class GraphElement
extends Object
implements PresentationElement

The most generic implementation of elements displayed in a graphical view. Recursive composition of a graph element with child elements of the same type.

Author:
Helen Bretzke
